text: Paul Goodloe is an American television meteorologist, currently working for The Weather Channel (TWC). Goodloe has been with TWC since 1999.http://www.weather.com/tv/tvshows/paul-goodloe He currently co-anchors Weekend Recharge with Liana Brackett and is a field reporter. ==Early career and education== Before coming to TWC Goodloe worked at KSDK-TV, KRIV, and KSBY-TV as a broadcast meteorologist. He received an undergraduate degree in geography at The University of Texas at Austin and a master's degree in climatology from the University of California, Berkeley.http://www.weather.com/tv/tvshows/paul-goodloe ==Accreditations== Goodloe is a member of The American Meteorological Society (AMS), The National Weather Association (NWA), and The National Association of Black Journalistshttp://www.weather.com/tv/personalities/Paul-Goodloe.html ==See also== * List of personalities on The Weather Channel ==References== ==External links== * Facebook page Category:American television meteorologists Category:African-American television personalities Category:The Weather Channel people Category:Living people Category:Television personalities from New Rochelle, New York Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:1968 births
